website_summaries.verdict: Users may be uncomfortable with how tightly this full face mask must be pulled to the face to seal correctly.
pros: With its one-size-fits-all frame, CPAP users need only fit the correct size cushion, saving money and time
Mask can flex inward slightly for storage
cons: Takes up a lot of room in travel storage bag
Must be pulled very tightly to the face, which could cause discomfort

customer_reviews.title: Much better fit for me!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much more comfortable than the nose pillows mask I started with. If you are a mouth breather this mask will make you much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Trimmier

customer_reviews.title: Great mask and would recommend to anyone looking for something comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great mask!!! When I ordered it, it said the head gear wasn't with it. So I ordered it separately and when I got the mask and opened it there was head gear with it. Luckily the head gear I ordered separately didn't ship yet so I was able to cancel it. This mask is the best I've had so far and I think it's very comfortable compared to the ones I've had in the past. I will be definitely be buying another one when I need another. I would definitely recommend this one to anyone that is looking for a comfortable mask. Just make sure you know what size fits best for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to what is actually included in this "kit"
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty disappointing because it was not clear what you actually get. Its NOT everything in the pic. So once it arrived, I discovered that I now had a frame with no headgear and my old one was styled differently so I had to continue using my broken mask until I placed another order, which they failed to deliver for some time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Oxley

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Ordered about a week ago and it arrived on time. Did not include any headgear and the one cushion it came with was a puncture. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: emily b.

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I have done for my sleep therapy.
customer_reviews.text: I was originally given a resmed airfit f10 mask by my therapist and had nothing but problems with it from the get go. After a long unproductive ordeal, I still had an unusable mask. I looked on amazon naturally, found this the f20. The magnetic head gear snaps genius, a pivoting quick release elbow amazing. Extra cushion with soft silacone it like a little silk cloud on your face. -----Do be sure to get f20 head gear straps otherwise it won't work because of the special magnetic snaps. -----
customer_reviews.author: Keria Shaw

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!  I can even wear my glasses.  I am so looking forward to tonight!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!! I can even wear my glasses. I am so looking forward to tonight!
customer_reviews.author: JohnDoeShopper

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t seal for me
customer_reviews.text: This is what I needed to get some good sleep. Unfortunately the mask had to be tightened so much to seal out that I couldn’t sleep. I’ve never had a pap mask that was set up like this.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Intake stops.  Should be called a sweat machine.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst mask I have used in 30 years. If power goes out in middle of night and then returns air doesn't automatically flow. Great, no air intake for someone who already has a dimished air supply. What were the designers thinking? All plastic, all sweat , all the time. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Great vender.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t seal properly. Very uncomfortable to wear. Great vendor though. Refunded my money with no issues. Would buy from them again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: This airfit 20 is comfortable and the small mask that cones with it is actually decent sized. I had an airfit 10 and the 20 is an upgrade all around.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Boeck

customer_reviews.title: This is a new ResMed model  with almost silent exhaust
customer_reviews.text: This is a new Resmed AirFir 20 design mask without the tiny holes for exhaust in the front This new design have exhaust holes in the back of the swivel and is almost silent. Even thou I prefer the old design they don’t have it anymore. This company have an excellent customer service. I really recommended
customer_reviews.author: Lidia

customer_reviews.title: best value!!!
customer_reviews.text: this mask fits perfectly. made solidly yet extra comfy! will purchase again for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Book Krazy

customer_reviews.title: Cpap mask
customer_reviews.text: Great mask. I should have bought a medium but I read page wrong. However, I’ve tried many masks and like this design the best.
customer_reviews.author: Revil

customer_reviews.title: How good the return policy was. It was my mistake for ordering wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Product was returned ONLY because I didn’t specify the size. Great company and product
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hester

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with headstrap!
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this I didn't realize it didn't come with the headgear. But once I was able to use it I was super please. This has got to be the best mask I have ever had. Most masks whistle or leak but this one is so quiet, I will definitely be back for my next one!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Krupa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mask
customer_reviews.text: I have been diagnosed with sleep apnea for 3 months or so now, and this is the BEST mask I’ve had thus far.... finally sleeping well!
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: New Product Sealed
customer_reviews.text: These are the good ones, great service, fast shipping, packed well, arrived in perfect condition and ahead of schedule
customer_reviews.author: Brad E.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fit
customer_reviews.text: OMG I can’t believe how wonderful sleep I had love it ,first nite hope no issues later , was using nose pillows but having leakage ...mouth breathing
customer_reviews.author: Bonita S.

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Great item, needed a new and this one is great, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Claeson

customer_reviews.title: This mask has no strap to wear.
customer_reviews.text: Since I never bought this before, I didn’t understand that the word “frame system” did not include head strap. So I have to order the strap separately.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best new mask
customer_reviews.text: I added the memory foam insert and popped plastic insert out...this i absolutely love so comfy and does not leak...i was allergic to silicone
customer_reviews.author: Colleen L wise

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Wish it could be put on auto-refill. So much better than the canned one you get with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: inawh

customer_reviews.title: Resmed CPAP mask
customer_reviews.text: I am replacing my current CPAP mask and headgear. I chose this as it is the same so I had no adjustment difficulties. I like this mask. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and product! Less than 1/2 of what it costs in local CPAP supply store.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: easiness and comfort
customer_reviews.text: THere were no directions in the book. Some reviews said the headpiece(strap) came with it some said no. Well mine didn't. Not what my husband was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Bleuler

customer_reviews.title: Give the fit a chance
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to switch from nasal prongs because they were irritating my nose. After the first night using this mask, I was ready to return it. I had trouble keeping a seal with my face. I rethought returning and tried it one more night. Although the mask was a bit too big for me, I was able to tweak it to make a good seal without air blowing in my eyes. I took some doing, but I was finally able to make it work. I would suggest applying the mask in front of a mirror. It's otherwise hard to tell if the mask is on straight.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: No way to connect to AirSense 10
customer_reviews.text: Since I was unable to ask a question here, I’m asking in the reviews. This mask does NOT connect to the Resmed tubes I have, neither the short tube or the long heated tube. I’m hoping Resmed will advise. In the questions, the seller says over and over that there is a white piece stuck in the tube. There’s isn’t anything like that in my tube. This mask would be perfect if I had a way to comment it to my Resmed AirSense 10 machine. I will change my review if I get some resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Resubmitting after receiving additional items.
customer_reviews.text: Only gave 4 stars, due to my annoyance with having to buy every item separate. Please read carefully, photograph shows complete, it is not. After saying all this, Mom is thrilled with the headgear, mask, all of it. She claims it's the best one she has tried so far. She's into her third week of wearing it nightly.
customer_reviews.author: Redsnapper

customer_reviews.title: A FLAW THAT COULD BE DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: The item works as intended, but it does have one flaw that could potentially result in loss of operation. The part that connects to the tube is a simple "slip-on" connection. If you are a tosser-and-turner, like I am, its possible to snag the tube and disrupt the air flow, and this is dangerous. I will not purchase this item again until this issue is fixed. There must be a way to attach the tube to the mark with a mechanism to prevent disconnection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No leaking around nose
customer_reviews.text: Best shaped full face mask I’ve tried...and I’ve tried a lot of them! If you usually have a lot of leaking around the nose like me this mask will work great for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Air fit 20 good backup as a replacement for her fit 30
customer_reviews.text: My mother uses the fit30 but one time her nose was sore and we decided a different type of full face mask should work to rest the area worked well. Her favorite is the fit30 full face nasal pillow. She is elderly with lots of wrinkles and she still gets a good face seal
customer_reviews.author: Doodah

customer_reviews.title: Full mask with cushion and elbow
customer_reviews.text: Full mask with cushion and elbow. There is no head gear with this product- which I did not need.
customer_reviews.author: Deb B

customer_reviews.title: The same as I could get from the clinic supply.
customer_reviews.text: It is as expected. The same as I could get from the clinic supply. Convienentsoce it comes to your front door.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Scheider

customer_reviews.title: Fits the best of 4 tried.
customer_reviews.text: Best one for me. I’ve tried 4. This one is the best fit to my face. The others leaked air which woke my husband up. This one fits better for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Garrone

customer_reviews.title: GreT mask
customer_reviews.text: Best fitting and most comfortable; seals well better than the air fit 20
customer_reviews.author: k tenges

customer_reviews.title: Does not include head gear...
customer_reviews.text: I saw at least one review that stated this came with the headgear part that wraps around my head. It did not. I was able to improvise using shoe strings. It came with the mask part and the elbow.
customer_reviews.author: J. Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: It feels like it has a suction that is very uncomfortable, Also leaks air , I would not recommend ,
customer_reviews.author: Becky Worley

customer_reviews.title: Cpap
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what to say. It works just like the one it replaced
customer_reviews.author: BobbyHill

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than my med supply company.
customer_reviews.text: Works well this is the best mask and cushion I have found for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Terri B

customer_reviews.title: For a child
customer_reviews.text: Be aware this is for a child’s face... I’m an adult trying to make it work. Apparently I’m a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Johns

customer_reviews.title: The most value for your money! All the pieces you need! 👍
customer_reviews.text: I have always ordered masks with foam seals they almost always split with air leaks that blew in my eyes. This mask was great. I was having to duct tape my head gear together!
customer_reviews.author: Julie a slenning

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Mask is very comfortable. Came 1 week earlier than promised. Great service. Make sure to order headgear, as this does not come with frame system.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask! I’ve tried many and this one is the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia L. Murakami

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. If you get this through an oxegyn place it will cost you over a hundred dollars. Great price and easy shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Keirn

product_meta.title: Resmed AirFit F20 Frame System Small with Cushion
product_meta.description: This is the replacement ResMed Airfit F20 frame system- NO Headgear is included with this item.
feature_bullets: This is the replacement ResMed Airfit F20 frame system

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
